ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Retained Earning Account No. is not filled in Application Setup !')
MlsTrans('Account No. Profit & Loss Not Exist !')
MlsTrans('Account No. Income Summary Not Exist !')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select top 1 JOURNAL_NO from GL_JURNALH where status = 'O' and CO_ID = ':1' and BR_ID = ':2' and FISCAL_YEAR = :3
